alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 10:32AM CDT until May 15 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Chase County in east central Kansas... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1032 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunlap, or 7 miles south of Council Grove, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saffordville. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 112 and 116. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
